info.author: Antonin Amand
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Zope Public License
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
======================
silva.app.mediacontent
======================

``silva.app.mediacontent`` a set of simple content types to add and
manage local and remote media content in Silva.

This extension requires Silva 3.x. For previous versions of Silva,
please use an older version of this extension.

Code repository
===============

The code for this extension can be found in Git:
https://github.com/silvacms/silva.app.mediacontent


Changes
=======

3.0.2 (2013/10/08)
------------------

- Update tests to be ran inside a transaction to ensure the last
  author is properly set.

3.0.1 (2013/05/23)
------------------

- Add support for XML export and import.

3.0 (2013/03/06)
----------------

- Add a block for ``silva.core.contentlayout`` generating a slideshow
  out of a folder of media content.

- Update media content to use a rich text.

1.0 (2012-05-11)
----------------

- Official release

1.0b1 (2010-02-08)
------------------

- Initial release
info.name: silva.app.mediacontent
info.summary: Media content types for Silva CMS
